item.title: Good Tech Tutorials/Blogs/Sites
item.description: Last Edit: 2023-11-15 Here are some good tutorials/articles/blogs that I found useful in my study and programming. Backend [Tutorial] [Notes] Authentication on the web. JWT, session, cookie, XSS, CSRF… [Tutorial] System Design Interview with AWS. Design Youtube, Whatsapp, Twitter. [SITE] Full stack web dev reference site. It has code example for any combo you want, e.g. Springboot+React, Django+Vue… Not comprehensive tutorials but definitely sufficient to create a runnable tech stack rapidly for testing purposes.
